thread.title: Gwen Stefani stuns in silver dress on The Tonight Show
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani stuns in silver dress on The Tonight Show | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Gwen Stefani stuns in silver dress on The Tonight Show
text:
Gwen Stefani looked sensational as she arrived at The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at Rockefeller Center on Wednesday.
The Voice coach wore a very sparkly mini dress and matching shoes as she dazzled on the late night chat show.
The 47-year-old songstress showed off her platinum blonde locks which were styled in a poker straight fashion.
Scroll for video
Stunner: Gwen Stefani looked sensational as she arrived at The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at Rockefeller Center on Wednesday
She showed off a lot of leg in the mini dress as she flaunted her porcelain skin.
Gwen went for a heavy eye make-up look opting to wear thick black eye liner and lots of mascara.
The blonde beauty was all smiles as she sat down to talk the popular chat show host.
Wondrous: The Voice coach wore a very sparkly mini dress and matching shoes as she dazzled on the late night chat show
Gwen has been doing the rounds to promote the the Voice, which is now on season 12.
She went on the Today Sho w to talk about the upcoming series and also her co-star and beau Blake Shelton.
When asked by the hosts how she and Blake spent Valentines she replied: 'He forgot!'
Wow: The 47-year-old songstress showed off her platinum blonde locks which were styled in a poker straight fashion
Ready for the night: Gwen went for a heavy eye make-up look opting to wear thick black eye liner and lots of mascara
However she quickly added: 'No, I'm just kidding. I got some beautiful flowers, lots of texts.'
The couple spent the holiday apart, as Stefani is in New York promoting the show's upcoming season and Shelton is currently in his home state of Oklahoma.
Stefani got candid about their relationship on the show and even admitted she was unsure how filming might be between them.
Got the giggles: The blonde beauty was all smiles as she sat down to talk the popular chat show host
The confirmed their relationship over a year ago but had yet to appear on the show as a couple.
'I was nervous at first. I was like, wait, is this going to be awkward? How am I going to act?' she said. 'But it's just natural.'
The Voice returns on February 27 at 8PM on NBC.
Backstage: She went on the Today Sho w to talk about the upcoming series and also her co-star and beau Blake Shelton
